front.title: IEEE Draft Standard for Local and Metropolitan Area Networks - Bridges and Bridged Networks Amendment: YANG Data Model

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.keyword: Virtual Bridged Local Area Networks (virtual LANs)
front.abstract: A YANG data model in support of configuration and operational status information for a subset of Bridging capabilities is provided in this amendment to IEEE Std 802.1Qâ„¢-2018.
